price: 9 Ne sait-il pas que les tombes seront vidées de leurs occupants
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
